meanings.definition: A person or thing that takes action.
meanings.sent1: The brave actioner stepped forward to help.
meanings.sent2: The team needed a quick actioner to solve the problem.
meanings.sent3: The little actioner squirrel tried to lift the acorn.
meanings.sent4: The actioner bee buzzed around the garden, always busy.
meanings.sent5: The actioner firefighter rushed into the burning building to save lives.

meanings.definition: A film or book characterized by a lot of action and excitement.
meanings.sent1: The actioner movie had non-stop car chases and explosions.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy watching actioner films on weekends.
meanings.sent3: The actioner novel kept me on the edge of my seat with its thrilling plot twists.
meanings.sent4: The actioner story unfolded like a rollercoaster ride of suspense.
meanings.sent5: The actioner blockbuster broke box office records with its intense scenes.
